name: Resorts Casino Online Games
description:
Enjoy the best of Resorts Casino Hotel in Atlantic City — from anywhere. The Resorts mobile app brings you everything you love about Atlantic City’s most storied land-based casino in a safe, secure, legal mobile app. ResortsCasino.com is licensed in New Jersey and is in full compliance with the New Jersey Division of Gaming Enforcement.

Getting started
You must physically be located in the State of New Jersey to play for real money*. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem and wants help, call 1-800-GAMBLER. You must be 21 or over to play on the ResortsCasino.com mobile app.

*While free games can be enjoyed anywhere, playing for real money requires you to be 21+ within New Jersey state lines.

Need help?
Support Email: Support@ResortsCasino.com
